In a bold extension of its mission, the spacecraft formerly known as OSIRIS-REx embarks on an unprecedented journey to explore asteroid Apophis.

articles.title: Webb telescope finds a second lensed supernova in a distant galaxy - Earth.com
articles.description: NASA’s James Webb Space Telescope has brought to light a second supernova event within the distant galaxy MRG-M0138.
articles.content:
